name: AstroSurfer
description:
Astro surfer is a small space-adventure game, surf among asteroids and reach the goal!

Movement: 'wasd' or arrow keys

Left shift: Boost (move faster)

Patric Gustafsson:  Lead programmer, Design; Github: https://github.com/vosgus

Joel Sjöberg : Artwork, Sound, Programming; Github: https://github.com/JoelSjoberg
